bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Part XXXI (Nos 2531-2616)

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.seg: Barns J.W.B., Peter Parsons, John Rea and Eric G. Turner, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Part XXXI (Nos 2531-2616). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 45.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1966, 8°, xv-207 pp. et X pll.

C.R. par Jean Bingen, Latomus 26 (1967) pp. 263-264. - Lloyd W. Daly, AJP 90 (1969) pp. 122-124. - Jean Irigoin, REG 81 (1968) pp. 243-244. - Orsolina Montevecchi, Aegyptus 45 (1965) pp. 285-287. - J. Pegueroles, StPap 6 (1967) pp. 71-72. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 42 (1967) No. 83, pp. 215-223. - B.R. Rees, CR N.S., 17 (1967) pp. 173-175. - Max Treu, Gnomon 40 (1968) pp. 346-356. - Hans Julius Wolff, ZSav 84 (1967) pp. 410-416.
